intro: Lotononis trisegmentata f. robusta, commonly known as the robust lotononis, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its robust growth habit and distinctive blue to violet flower heads. The plant features narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, daisy-like flowers that are typically arranged in compact clusters. Native to southern Africa, it thrives in well-drained soils and full sun exposure. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
